replies.body: It means that majority of mages are out of the meta, at least for that patch.

> [{quoted}](name=JQKAndrei,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mLz3EnXv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-06T12:28:37.797+0000)
>
> It means that majority of mages are out of the meta, at least for that patch.

majority? how is this going to put mages out of the meta? this change will just mean that mages cant abuse an item that shuts down the ACTUAL MAJORITY of bruisers.
I really doubt you'll see much of {{champion:84}} next patch, she's just not good no matter how you itemize her.

I have seen some crazy akali one-shots after the assasin rework on youtube.
I do not agree with you sir.

I think that might be good for the balance of the game. Personally, ive been feeling that mages have been too strong these past few patches, and they didn't really build survivability, since they burst people too fast to deal with them
That's good. Rod of Ages is a way healthier item for mages to buy than Rylai's anyway.
http://img.pandawhale.com/82733-why-not-both-meme-5LvD.jpeg
Sir what are you doing bringing spicy memes into gameplay?
just posing a real gameplay question my dear Magus7a.

You think that's all it will take for assassins to be meta?  LUL.  Its gonna be the same shit next patch, the best mid laners are still Leblanc (because she is overtuned), Ryze, Ori, Syndra, Viktor, etc.  Assassins are still trash.
i think they should just add higher  damage items with no utility so that mages have to play smarter but are rewarded for it.
remember dfg? yeah I don't either.
i actually wasn't playing league when DFG was a thing i was only around briefly when it was nerfed into the ground so if theres some meme or something you're making i don't get it.
What I'm saying is that when a non utility item is good damage is cancer and specific mages can't be played seriously.
so don't make it fucking insane just make it reasonably strong.
{{item:3089}} this thing ring a bell? only good items get used in the manner you are thinking.

Deathcap is nice but i would prefer that all of my other items be high damage items too. I would at least like the option to have the play style of full AP but right now most items don't give over 100 ap. make it a good item obviously but don't make it broken. Make it this strange thing called..... fair and balanced????

not possible. items that are purely ap are either trash or broken with no inbetween.

Clearly you are incapable of understanding.
its very possible to balance out items that are purely ap lol wut. {{item:3285}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3135}} are perfectly fine items.

Shit
Situational
You don't get it for its ap.

I stand by the point I made previously.
Rylai's is 600 gold cheaper too. i find that buying it much earlier will actually make it more annoying.

Yeah, but:

1. it's super cost inefficient now
2. It's bad lategame item
3. Overall ROA has everything "new" Rylai has, but better.

For a lot of users the utility portion of Rylai's has not changed (anyone with AoE or minion damage will have the same slow). I'll admit that late game it will decrease your overall slot efficiency due to the reduction in AP and HP, but for most mages/ap bruisers that really want the slow effect ({{champion:90}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:136}} ) as well as mages supports it is pretty much a power neutral change.

Actually singed doesn't (shouldn't) want slow on his poison trail. You'd have to stop every few meters so mobs could catch poison again etc.

For heimers slow is also worthless, cause it works only on turret beams. Otherwise turrets basic AA don't trigger Rylai.

For Aurelion Rylai is a must. No matter if strong or weak

Malzahar? He'd do better with Roa now Imo. His kit has nothing that could work better with slow. Pre-rework malz, when he had his %max hp pool, then yeah.. But now? Not really.

---

But yea there will still be some champs that'd buy Rylai.
Shame that Riot decided to crap on its most important stat, defenses (hp) for small amounts of mana.

> Actually singed doesn't (shouldn't) want slow on his poison trail. You'd have to stop every few meters so mobs could catch poison again etc.

What? Singed for sure wants Rylai's because it both makes him more tanky and aids in trapping enemies in your trail.

> For heimers slow is also worthless, cause it works only on turret beams. Otherwise turrets basic AA don't trigger Rylai.

Wrong, with the MYMU Rylai's slow applies to minions so his turret shots always apply the slow (currently it is 20% for 1 second so it won't be effected by the Rylai's change).

>Malzahar? He'd do better with Roa now Imo. His kit has nothing that could work better with slow. Pre-rework malz, when he had his %max hp pool, then yeah.. But now? Not really.

Malzahar for sure wants Rylai's because he needs to stay close to his target to maximize the number of voidlings he has out (and hence is damage).

In all honesty I don't think you understand how Rylai's works now, its intended use case, or even how it is being changed (it doesn't give mana so I don't know what you are talking about with the hp and mana argument).
Rylais is a support item now..cheaper and its really only used for the slow at this point.
No, it's just a better early game item rather then the rush or late game it used to be.
Eh, Morde is going to get hit but it's not like some small buffs can put him back into the spot he currently is.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mLz3EnXv,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-12-06T16:26:40.057+0000)
>
> Eh, Morde is going to get hit but it's not like some small buffs can put him back into the spot he currently is.

Pretty sure he's going to need more than small buffs tbh.
Unquestionably needs his movement speed buffed and base stats.
(The garbage sadly)
Big buff for {{champion:27}}
R.I.P Malicious Metal
What is dead may never die!
Fuck us melee mage players I guess.{{champion:68}}

For you its a buff actually. Rylais AP is being lowered yes, but lets face it, you got it because it has a slow and HP, the AP was a bonus.

HP and slow stay, and the cost is reduced by 600g!
For you guys, who don't have to give a damn about mana, this is a buff.

Literally half the slow amount for people like Morde.
The loss of stats also hurts him since his base stats are so laughably weak.

True.

But then again, considering how Mordekaiser has been treated so far, what difference will one more nail make in a coffin, that looks like a junior-carpenters training piece already?

My response to people that say Mordekaiser is OP

 https://i.imgflip.com/17duri.jpg

If you walk into melee range of Mordekaiser as a squishy your asking to get destroyed by him

The possibility that was missed

> "You know what that memes"

How to indirectly give your opinion that others should not play AP in this game:
- remove mana potions
- nerf AP items. Even over nerf them, just in case
- rework/delete AP items. Or even better change them into support items
- buff MR for ADs
- nerf AP
- nerf some mages
- add new tools for supports to protect ADCs from mages
- remove AP buff from Golem
- make most of Ap items cost inefficient
- buff Lee Sin
- rework some mages into something noone kinda liked
- add as many counter items for mages as you can
- buff Maw, main anti-mage tool
- rework other part of mages into support-or-reported

And if players still play mages then.........

Rest will come after incoming tank gutting update!

Lmao so true. They continuously nerf mages yet the top 17 champions with the highest win rates are mages. If you aren't playing the top 17 mages and you are playing a mage you win rate is abysmal {{champion:163}} 42% rip

And no {{champion:82}}  buffs to compensate for the nerf...

Still at 325 movement speed which is what Soraka has just less HP than her at lvl 18.
Looks like I'm gonna actually enjoy Singed early game again.
I thought the biggest part of the patch was the vayne nerf
But what about {{champion:30}}?

Indeed.... what about him????

http://i.imgur.com/mN1TPqx.png
To be fair you have a huge amount of deaths and very little kills for a lot of those matches

Yeah, for you see... his passive is really powerful when you're **DEAD**

http://i.imgur.com/iCvqPDP.png
